thread.title: Qatar Airways announces great savings for UK travellers
thread.title_full: Qatar Airways announces great savings for UK travellers

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Qatar Airways announces great savings for UK travellers
text:
Qatar Airways announces great savings for UK travellers Qatar Airways announces great savings for UK travellers Details   11:45 Travellers can take advantage of substantial savings to destinations across the world with the award-winning airline Qatar Airways is encouraging travellers to explore the world for less with their latest regional promotion offering savings on airfares to a variety of destinations across Asia-Pacific, the Middle East and South Africa. 
Available on bookings from now until 2 August 2015, UK travellers will have the opportunity to discover new destinations for less with Qatar Airways’ Regional Promotion. Customers can take advantage of the long travel validity during the promotional offer and book their tickets for travel from September through to June 2016. Qatar Airways Country Manager, UK & Ireland, Richard Oliver said: “We are delighted to offer Qatar Airways’ UK customers the opportunity to experience Skytrax’s 2015 Airline of the Year for less with this promotion. Customers can travel for business and leisure to destinations such as Singapore, Perth and Bangkok on board the award-winning airline.” Qatar Airways was awarded the prestigious ‘Airline of the Year’ accolade at the 2015 Skytrax World Airline Awards for the third time at the Paris Air Show. The airline also collected two other awards: Best Business Class Airline Seat and Best Airline in the Middle East – which Qatar Airways won for the ninth time. Bookings can be made by visiting any Qatar Airways’ sales office, appointed travel partners or via the qatar airways website. Seats are limited and subject to availability and blackout dates apply.
